title: ProcurementDecisionExplanation
description: Procurement-specific explanation bundle for decisions such as award recommendations or risk classifications.

explanationId.description: Identifier for this procurement decision explanation.

tenderId.description: Identifier of the tender involved in the decision.

contractId.description: Identifier of the contract, if applicable.

supplierId.description: Identifier of the supplier the decision concerns.

decisionType.description: Type of decision (e.g., AWARD_RECOMMENDED, AWARD_NOT_RECOMMENDED, RISK_FLAG).
